entry.summary:
Re @LeomOfThings explains #ChainAbstraction with Lego. ðŸ§±
leom of CLA:â€‚Explaining @NEARProtocol #ChainAbstraction like you are a five-year-old using Lego. Imagine you have lots of different Lego sets. Each set has its own unique pieces and instructions. What if you want to build something big using pieces from all the different sets?
